    • Uses of Universe in fast3d.complex

      Methods in fast3d.complex with parameters of type Universe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Object.addGroupsToUniverse(Universe uni)
      adds all hold groups to the given Universe
      void Scene.addObjectsToUniverse(Universe uni)
      adds all hold objects to the given Universe
      void Scene.addToUniverse(Universe uni)
      calls addToUniverse for all contained objects
      void Object.addToUniverse(Universe uni)
      calls addToUniverse for all contained groups
      void Group.addToUniverse(Universe uni)
      performs uni.add(Triangle) for all hold triangles
      void Scene.removeFromUniverse(Universe uni)
      calls removeFromUniverse for all contained groups
      void Object.removeFromUniverse(Universe uni)
      calls removeFromUniverse for all contained groups
      void Group.removeFromUniverse(Universe uni)
      performs uni.remove(Triangle) for all hold triangles
      void Object.removeGroupsFromUniverse(Universe uni)
      removes all hold groups from the given Universe
      void Scene.removeObjectsFromUniverse(Universe uni)
      removes all hold objects from the given Universe
